text: Atahpara yakhana amadera kacha theke tadera kache satya asala, tara balate lagala, ‘musake yerupa deya hayechila, take serupa deya hala na kena?’ Kintu age musake ya deya hayechila ta ki tara asbikara kareni? Tara balechila, ‘du‘ti'i jadu, eke an'yake samarthana kare’ ebam tara balechila, ‘amara sakalake'i pratyakhyana kari.’
